00059 /*----------------- enums ---------------------------*/
00064 enum ObitErrCode {
00066   OBIT_None = 0,
00068   OBIT_InfoErr,
00070   OBIT_InfoWarn,
00072   OBIT_Traceback,
00074   OBIT_MildError,
00076   OBIT_Error,
00078   OBIT_StrongError,
00080   OBIT_Fatal
00081 };/* end enum ObitErrCode */
00085 typedef enum ObitErrCode ObitErrCode;
00086 
00088 #define OBITERRBUFSIZE 120
00089 
00090 /*----------------- Macroes ---------------------------*/
00098 #define Obit_log_error(err,errCode,format...)        G_STMT_START{ \
00099         g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE, format);          \
00100         ObitErrPush (err, errCode, err->buffer);                   \
00101         if (errCode>OBIT_Traceback) {                              \
00102            g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                \
00103                        " This occured at file %s: line %d (%s)",   \
00104                         __FILE__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__);  \
00105            ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Error, err->buffer);             \
00106           }                                                        \
00107         }G_STMT_END  
00108 
00116 #define Obit_log_error_no_trace(err,errCode,format...) G_STMT_START{ \
00117         g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE, format);          \
00118         ObitErrPush (err, errCode, err->buffer);                   \
00119         }G_STMT_END  
00120 
00129 #define Obit_return_if_fail(expr,err,format...)   G_STMT_START{  \
00130      if (expr) { } else  {                                       \
00131         g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE, format);        \
00132         ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Error, err->buffer);              \
00133         g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                 \
00134                     " Occured at file %s: line %d (%s)",         \
00135                      __FILE__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__);   \
00136         ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Error, err->buffer);              \
00137         return;                                                  \
00138      } }G_STMT_END  
00139 
00150 #define Obit_retval_if_fail(expr,err,out,format...) G_STMT_START{ \
00151      if (expr) { } else  {                                        \
00152         g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE, format);         \
00153         ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Error, err->buffer);               \
00154         g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                  \
00155                     " Occured at file %s: line %d (%s)",          \
00156                      __FILE__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__);    \
00157         ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Error, err->buffer);               \
00158         return out;                                               \
00159      } }G_STMT_END  
00160 
00168 #define Obit_traceback_msg(err,me,name) G_STMT_START{           \
00169      g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                   \
00170                 "Traceback: routine %s:  object %s", me, name); \
00171      ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Traceback, err->buffer);            \
00172      g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                   \
00173                  " Occured at file %s: line %d (%s)",           \
00174                   __FILE__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__);     \
00175       ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Traceback, err->buffer);           \
00176       return;                                                   \
00177      }G_STMT_END
00178 
00187 #define Obit_traceback_val(err,me,name,out) G_STMT_START{       \
00188      g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                   \
00189                 "Traceback: routine %s:  object %s", me, name); \
00190      ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Traceback, err->buffer);            \
00191      g_snprintf (err->buffer, OBITERRBUFSIZE,                   \
00192                  " at file %s: line %d (%s)",                   \
00193                   __FILE__, __LINE__, __PRETTY_FUNCTION__);     \
00194       ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Traceback, err->buffer);           \
00195       return out;                                               \
00196      }G_STMT_END
00197 
00203 #define Obit_cfitsio_error(err)   G_STMT_START{                       \
00204       while (fits_read_errmsg(err->buffer))                           \
00205         ObitErrPush (err, OBIT_Error, err->buffer);                   \
00206       fits_clear_errmsg();     }G_STMT_END
